GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.15.71
GSD.description:
netfilter: nfnetlink_osf: fix possible bogus match in nf_osf_find()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.71 by commit 816eab147e5c6f6621922b8515ad9010ceb1735e, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit 22c7652cdaa8cd33ce78bacceb4e826a3f795873. For more details please see the references link.
